name: places/ChIJqVufqlZYwokR_DhI2sNVuqc
formattedAddress: 322A W 47th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 322A W 47th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
We’ve been here for massages 5 times and I’m looking forward to our next session in January. Steven worked on my wife last night and Jenny worked on me. Both were very good. In the past I’ve had Steven- 3 times- and my wife had Jenny and both of us felt like we’d had some of the best massages we’ve ever had. I think we’ll request Steven for me and Jenny for her next time.

Don’t expect a fancy spa, but you will get a great massage and the people are quite nice.

originalText.text: Jessie is amazing. I haven't had a massage this good and professional for years. She really took her time to find where my back pain came from, and did a deep massage for me to release the pressure. My shoulders feel much better after her treatment. She also used volcano stones to warm up my back, it's so comfy I love it. I recommend 90mins massage so she can really take the time to help you. She is better than most RMTs I had.

text.text: Jessie is amazing. I haven't had a massage this good and professional for years. She really took her time to find where my back pain came from, and did a deep massage for me to release the pressure. My shoulders feel much better after her treatment. originalText.text: This place was highly recommended, but I’m gonna have to say, from me, not so much. We were escorted down stairs to a basement room. Felt very sketchy, but we were like whatever. The two therapists argued in a different language for probably 20 minutes. Definitely not relaxing. No music was playing. I saw a roach crawl across the floor when I was dressing. Not to mention my therapist left the room 9 times during my massage time. And the time was not made up. I would have to say steer clear of this dive.

originalText.text: One of the best massages I've ever had.  After a long day of exploring NY on foot we went for a 1/2 hour foot massage and it was so great that we booked a full massage for the day we were leaving just prior to our flight.  David was my massage therapist and he was incredible.  I love a strong massage and he definitley went deep but also knew when to pull back  to relax the muscle before going in further - extremely intuitive.  The place is simple, very clean and right off Time Square so couldn't be more convenient.  This will definitley be a "go to" for me every time I visit NY.  Thanks David!

originalText.text: If you're looking for a traditional spa-like experience, this might not be for you. But if you are looking for one of the best massages you've ever had, this is the place! Steven gave me the best deep tissue massage ever. What's even better is we didn't have an appointment and were immediately accommodated. We will definitely be back!
